detachVpnGateway.description: Grants permission to detach a virtual private gateway from a VPC

disableEbsEncryptionByDefault.description: Grants permission to disable EBS encryption by default for your account

disableFastLaunch.description: Grants permission to disable faster launching for Windows AMIs

disableFastSnapshotRestores.description: Grants permission to disable fast snapshot restores for one or more snapshots in specified Availability Zones

disableImageDeprecation.description: Grants permission to cancel the deprecation of the specified AMI

disableIpamOrganizationAdminAccount.description: Grants permission to disable an AWS Organizations member account as an Amazon VPC IP Address Manager (IPAM) admin account

disableSerialConsoleAccess.description: Grants permission to disable access to the EC2 serial console of all instances for your account

disableTransitGatewayRouteTablePropagati.description: Grants permission to disable a resource attachment from propagating routes to the specified propagation route table

disableVgwRoutePropagation.description: Grants permission to disable a virtual private gateway from propagating routes to a specified route table of a VPC

disableVpcClassicLink.description: Grants permission to disable ClassicLink for a VPC

disableVpcClassicLinkDnsSupport.description: Grants permission to disable ClassicLink DNS support for a VPC

disassociateAddress.description: Grants permission to disassociate an Elastic IP address from an instance or network interface

disassociateClientVpnTargetNetwork.description: Grants permission to disassociate a target network from a Client VPN endpoint

disassociateEnclaveCertificateIamRole.description: Grants permission to disassociate an ACM certificate from a IAM role

disassociateIamInstanceProfile.description: Grants permission to disassociate an IAM instance profile from a running or stopped instance

disassociateInstanceEventWindow.description: Grants permission to disassociate one or more targets from an event window

disassociateRouteTable.description: Grants permission to disassociate a subnet from a route table

disassociateSubnetCidrBlock.description: Grants permission to disassociate a CIDR block from a subnet

disassociateTransitGatewayMulticastDomai.description: Grants permission to disassociate one or more subnets from a transit gateway multicast domain

disassociateTransitGatewayRouteTable.description: Grants permission to disassociate a resource attachment from a transit gateway route table

disassociateTrunkInterface.description: Grants permission to disassociate a branch network interface to a trunk network interface

disassociateVpcCidrBlock.description: Grants permission to disassociate a CIDR block from a VPC

enableEbsEncryptionByDefault.description: Grants permission to enable EBS encryption by default for your account

enableFastLaunch.description: Grants permission to enable faster launching for Windows AMIs

enableFastSnapshotRestores.description: Grants permission to enable fast snapshot restores for one or more snapshots in specified Availability Zones

enableImageDeprecation.description: Grants permission to enable deprecation of the specified AMI at the specified date and time

enableIpamOrganizationAdminAccount.description: Grants permission to enable an AWS Organizations member account as an Amazon VPC IP Address Manager (IPAM) admin account

enableSerialConsoleAccess.description: Grants permission to enable access to the EC2 serial console of all instances for your account

enableTransitGatewayRouteTablePropagatio.description: Grants permission to enable an attachment to propagate routes to a propagation route table

enableVgwRoutePropagation.description: Grants permission to enable a virtual private gateway to propagate routes to a VPC route table

enableVolumeIO.description: Grants permission to enable I/O operations for a volume that had I/O operations disabled

enableVpcClassicLink.description: Grants permission to enable a VPC for ClassicLink

enableVpcClassicLinkDnsSupport.description: Grants permission to enable a VPC to support DNS hostname resolution for ClassicLink

exportClientVpnClientCertificateRevocati.description: Grants permission to download the client certificate revocation list for a Client VPN endpoint

exportClientVpnClientConfiguration.description: Grants permission to download the contents of the Client VPN endpoint configuration file for a Client VPN endpoint

exportImage.description: Grants permission to export an Amazon Machine Image (AMI) to a VM file

exportTransitGatewayRoutes.description: Grants permission to export routes from a transit gateway route table to an Amazon S3 bucket

getAssociatedEnclaveCertificateIamRoles.description: Grants permission to get the list of roles associated with an ACM certificate

getAssociatedIpv6PoolCidrs.description: Grants permission to get information about the IPv6 CIDR block associations for a specified IPv6 address pool

getCapacityReservationUsage.description: Grants permission to get usage information about a Capacity Reservation

getCoipPoolUsage.description: Grants permission to describe the allocations from the specified customer-owned address pool

getConsoleOutput.description: Grants permission to get the console output for an instance

getConsoleScreenshot.description: Grants permission to retrieve a JPG-format screenshot of a running instance

getDefaultCreditSpecification.description: Grants permission to get the default credit option for CPU usage of a burstable performance instance family

getEbsDefaultKmsKeyId.description: Grants permission to get the ID of the default customer master key (CMK) for EBS encryption by default

getEbsEncryptionByDefault.description: Grants permission to describe whether EBS encryption by default is enabled for your account

getFlowLogsIntegrationTemplate.description: Grants permission to generate a CloudFormation template to streamline the integration of VPC flow logs with Amazon Athena

getGroupsForCapacityReservation.description: Grants permission to list the resource groups to which a Capacity Reservation has been added

getHostReservationPurchasePreview.description: Grants permission to preview a reservation purchase with configurations that match those of a Dedicated Host

getInstanceTypesFromInstanceRequirements.description: Grants permission to view a list of instance types with specified instance attributes

getIpamAddressHistory.description: Grants permission to retrieve historical information about a CIDR within an Amazon VPC IP Address Manager (IPAM) scope

getIpamPoolAllocations.description: Grants permission to get a list of all the CIDR allocations in an Amazon VPC IP Address Manager (IPAM) pool

getIpamPoolCidrs.description: Grants permission to get the CIDRs provisioned to an Amazon VPC IP Address Manager (IPAM) pool

getIpamResourceCidrs.description: Grants permission to get information about the resources in an Amazon VPC IP Address Manager (IPAM) scope

getLaunchTemplateData.description: Grants permission to get the configuration data of the specified instance for use with a new launch template or launch template version

getManagedPrefixListAssociations.description: Grants permission to get information about the resources that are associated with the specified managed prefix list

getManagedPrefixListEntries.description: Grants permission to get information about the entries for a specified managed prefix list

getNetworkInsightsAccessScopeAnalysisFin.description: Grants permission to get the findings for one or more Network Access Scope analyses

getNetworkInsightsAccessScopeContent.description: Grants permission to get the content for a specified Network Access Scope

getPasswordData.description: Grants permission to retrieve the encrypted administrator password for a running Windows instance

getReservedInstancesExchangeQuote.description: Grants permission to return a quote and exchange information for exchanging one or more Convertible Reserved Instances for a new Convertible Reserved Instance

getResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to describe an IAM policy that enables cross-account sharing

getSerialConsoleAccessStatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve the access status of your account to the EC2 serial console of all instances

getSpotPlacementScores.description: Grants permission to calculate the Spot placement score for a Region or Availability Zone based on the specified target capacity and compute requirements

getSubnetCidrReservations.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the subnet CIDR reservations

getTransitGatewayAttachmentPropagations.description: Grants permission to list the route tables to which a resource attachment propagates routes

getTransitGatewayMulticastDomainAssociat.description: Grants permission to get information about the associations for a transit gateway multicast domain

getTransitGatewayPrefixListReferences.description: Grants permission to get information about prefix list references for a transit gateway route table

getTransitGatewayRouteTableAssociations.description: Grants permission to get information about associations for a transit gateway route table

getTransitGatewayRouteTablePropagations.description: Grants permission to get information about the route table propagations for a transit gateway route table

getVpnConnectionDeviceSampleConfiguratio.description: Grants permission to download an AWS-provided sample configuration file to be used with the customer gateway device

getVpnConnectionDeviceTypes.description: Grants permission to obtain a list of customer gateway devices for which sample configuration files can be provided

importClientVpnClientCertificateRevocati.description: Grants permission to upload a client certificate revocation list to a Client VPN endpoint

importImage.description: Grants permission to import single or multi-volume disk images or EBS snapshots into an Amazon Machine Image (AMI)

importInstance.description: Grants permission to create an import instance task using metadata from a disk image

importKeyPair.description: Grants permission to import a public key from an RSA key pair that was created with a third-party tool

importSnapshot.description: Grants permission to import a disk into an EBS snapshot

importVolume.description: Grants permission to create an import volume task using metadata from a disk image

listImagesInRecycleBin.description: Grants permission to list Amazon Machine Images (AMIs) that are currently in the Recycle Bin

listSnapshotsInRecycleBin.description: Grants permission to list the Amazon EBS snapshots that are currently in the Recycle Bin

modifyAddressAttribute.description: Grants permission to modify an attribute of the specified Elastic IP address

modifyAvailabilityZoneGroup.description: Grants permission to modify the opt-in status of the Local Zone and Wavelength Zone group for your account

modifyCapacityReservation.description: Grants permission to modify a Capacity Reservation's capacity and the conditions under which it is to be released

modifyCapacityReservationFleet.description: Grants permission to modify a Capacity Reservation Fleet

modifyClientVpnEndpoint.description: Grants permission to modify a Client VPN endpoint

modifyDefaultCreditSpecification.description: Grants permission to change the account level default credit option for CPU usage of burstable performance instances

modifyEbsDefaultKmsKeyId.description: Grants permission to change the default customer master key (CMK) for EBS encryption by default for your account

modifyFleet.description: Grants permission to modify an EC2 Fleet

modifyFpgaImageAttribute.description: Grants permission to modify an attribute of an Amazon FPGA Image (AFI)

modifyHosts.description: Grants permission to modify a Dedicated Host

modifyIdFormat.description: Grants permission to modify the ID format for a resource

modifyIdentityIdFormat.description: Grants permission to modify the ID format of a resource for a specific principal in your account

modifyImageAttribute.description: Grants permission to modify an attribute of an Amazon Machine Image (AMI)

modifyInstanceAttribute.description: Grants permission to modify an attribute of an instance

modifyInstanceCapacityReservationAttribu.description: Grants permission to modify the Capacity Reservation settings for a stopped instance

modifyInstanceCreditSpecification.description: Grants permission to modify the credit option for CPU usage on an instance

modifyInstanceEventStartTime.description: Grants permission to modify the start time for a scheduled EC2 instance event

modifyInstanceEventWindow.description: Grants permission to modify the specified event window

modifyInstanceMetadataOptions.description: Grants permission to modify the metadata options for an instance

modifyInstancePlacement.description: Grants permission to modify the placement attributes for an instance

modifyIpam.description: Grants permission to modify the configurations of an Amazon VPC IP Address Manager (IPAM)

modifyIpamPool.description: Grants permission to modify the configurations of an Amazon VPC IP Address Manager (IPAM) pool

modifyIpamResourceCidr.description: Grants permission to modify the configurations of an Amazon VPC IP Address Manager (IPAM) resource CIDR

modifyIpamScope.description: Grants permission to modify the configurations of an Amazon VPC IP Address Manager (IPAM) scope

modifyLaunchTemplate.description: Grants permission to modify a launch template

modifyManagedPrefixList.description: Grants permission to modify a managed prefix list

modifyNetworkInterfaceAttribute.description: Grants permission to modify an attribute of a network interface

modifyPrivateDnsNameOptions.description: Grants permission to modify the options for instance hostnames for the specified instance

modifyReservedInstances.description: Grants permission to modify attributes of one or more Reserved Instances

modifySecurityGroupRules.description: Grants permission to modify the rules of a security group

modifySnapshotAttribute.description: Grants permission to add or remove permission settings for a snapshot

modifySnapshotTier.description: Grants permission to archive Amazon EBS snapshots

modifySpotFleetRequest.description: Grants permission to modify a Spot Fleet request

modifySubnetAttribute.description: Grants permission to modify an attribute of a subnet

modifyTrafficMirrorFilterNetworkServices.description: Grants permission to allow or restrict mirroring network services

modifyTrafficMirrorFilterRule.description: Grants permission to modify a traffic mirror rule

modifyTrafficMirrorSession.description: Grants permission to modify a traffic mirror session

modifyTransitGateway.description: Grants permission to modify a transit gateway

modifyTransitGatewayPrefixListReference.description: Grants permission to modify a transit gateway prefix list reference

modifyTransitGatewayVpcAttachment.description: Grants permission to modify a VPC attachment on a transit gateway

modifyVolume.description: Grants permission to modify the parameters of an EBS volume

modifyVolumeAttribute.description: Grants permission to modify an attribute of a volume

modifyVpcAttribute.description: Grants permission to modify an attribute of a VPC

modifyVpcEndpoint.description: Grants permission to modify an attribute of a VPC endpoint

modifyVpcEndpointConnectionNotification.description: Grants permission to modify a connection notification for a VPC endpoint or VPC endpoint service

modifyVpcEndpointServiceConfiguration.description: Grants permission to modify the attributes of a VPC endpoint service configuration

modifyVpcEndpointServicePayerResponsibil.description: Grants permission to modify the payer responsibility for a VPC endpoint service

modifyVpcEndpointServicePermissions.description: Grants permission to modify the permissions for a VPC endpoint service

modifyVpcPeeringConnectionOptions.description: Grants permission to modify the VPC peering connection options on one side of a VPC peering connection

modifyVpcTenancy.description: Grants permission to modify the instance tenancy attribute of a VPC

modifyVpnConnection.description: Grants permission to modify the target gateway of a Site-to-Site VPN connection

modifyVpnConnectionOptions.description: Grants permission to modify the connection options for your Site-to-Site VPN connection

modifyVpnTunnelCertificate.description: Grants permission to modify the certificate for a Site-to-Site VPN connection

modifyVpnTunnelOptions.description: Grants permission to modify the options for a Site-to-Site VPN connection

monitorInstances.description: Grants permission to enable detailed monitoring for a running instance

moveAddressToVpc.description: Grants permission to move an Elastic IP address from the EC2-Classic platform to the EC2-VPC platform

moveByoipCidrToIpam.description: Grants permission to move a BYOIP IPv4 CIDR to Amazon VPC IP Address Manager (IPAM) from a public IPv4 pool

provisionByoipCidr.description: Grants permission to provision an address range for use in AWS through bring your own IP addresses (BYOIP), and to create a corresponding address pool

provisionIpamPoolCidr.description: Grants permission to provision a CIDR to an Amazon VPC IP Address Manager (IPAM) pool

provisionPublicIpv4PoolCidr.description: Grants permission to provision a CIDR to a public IPv4 pool

purchaseHostReservation.description: Grants permission to purchase a reservation with configurations that match those of a Dedicated Host

purchaseReservedInstancesOffering.description: Grants permission to purchase a Reserved Instance offering

purchaseScheduledInstances.description: Grants permission to purchase one or more Scheduled Instances with a specified schedule

putResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to attach an IAM policy that enables cross-account sharing to a resource

rebootInstances.description: Grants permission to request a reboot of one or more instances

registerImage.description: Grants permission to register an Amazon Machine Image (AMI)

registerInstanceEventNotificationAttribu.description: Grants permission to add tags to the set of tags to include in notifications about scheduled events for your instances

registerTransitGatewayMulticastGroupMemb.description: Grants permission to register one or more network interfaces as a member of a group IP address in a transit gateway multicast domain

registerTransitGatewayMulticastGroupSour.description: Grants permission to register one or more network interfaces as a source of a group IP address in a transit gateway multicast domain

rejectTransitGatewayMulticastDomainAssoc.description: Grants permission to reject requests to associate cross-account subnets with a transit gateway multicast domain

rejectTransitGatewayPeeringAttachment.description: Grants permission to reject a transit gateway peering attachment request

rejectTransitGatewayVpcAttachment.description: Grants permission to reject a request to attach a VPC to a transit gateway

rejectVpcEndpointConnections.description: Grants permission to reject one or more VPC endpoint connection requests to a VPC endpoint service

rejectVpcPeeringConnection.description: Grants permission to reject a VPC peering connection request

releaseAddress.description: Grants permission to release an Elastic IP address

releaseHosts.description: Grants permission to release one or more On-Demand Dedicated Hosts

releaseIpamPoolAllocation.description: Grants permission to release an allocation within an Amazon VPC IP Address Manager (IPAM) pool

replaceIamInstanceProfileAssociation.description: Grants permission to replace an IAM instance profile for an instance

replaceNetworkAclAssociation.description: Grants permission to change which network ACL a subnet is associated with

replaceNetworkAclEntry.description: Grants permission to replace an entry (rule) in a network ACL

replaceRoute.description: Grants permission to replace a route within a route table in a VPC

replaceRouteTableAssociation.description: Grants permission to change the route table that is associated with a subnet

replaceTransitGatewayRoute.description: Grants permission to replace a route in a transit gateway route table

reportInstanceStatus.description: Grants permission to submit feedback about the status of an instance

requestSpotFleet.description: Grants permission to create a Spot Fleet request

requestSpotInstances.description: Grants permission to create a Spot Instance request

resetAddressAttribute.description: Grants permission to reset the attribute of the specified IP address

resetEbsDefaultKmsKeyId.description: Grants permission to reset the default customer master key (CMK) for EBS encryption for your account to use the AWS-managed CMK for EBS

resetFpgaImageAttribute.description: Grants permission to reset an attribute of an Amazon FPGA Image (AFI) to its default value

resetImageAttribute.description: Grants permission to reset an attribute of an Amazon Machine Image (AMI) to its default value

resetInstanceAttribute.description: Grants permission to reset an attribute of an instance to its default value

resetNetworkInterfaceAttribute.description: Grants permission to reset an attribute of a network interface

resetSnapshotAttribute.description: Grants permission to reset permission settings for a snapshot

restoreAddressToClassic.description: Grants permission to restore an Elastic IP address that was previously moved to the EC2-VPC platform back to the EC2-Classic platform

restoreImageFromRecycleBin.description: Grants permission to restore an Amazon Machine Image (AMI) from the Recycle Bin

restoreManagedPrefixListVersion.description: Grants permission to restore the entries from a previous version of a managed prefix list to a new version of the prefix list

restoreSnapshotFromRecycleBin.description: Grants permission to restore an Amazon EBS snapshot from the Recycle Bin

restoreSnapshotTier.description: Grants permission to restore an archived Amazon EBS snapshot for use temporarily or permanently, or modify the restore period or restore type for a snapshot that was previously temporarily restored

revokeClientVpnIngress.description: Grants permission to remove an inbound authorization rule from a Client VPN endpoint

revokeSecurityGroupEgress.description: Grants permission to remove one or more outbound rules from a VPC security group

revokeSecurityGroupIngress.description: Grants permission to remove one or more inbound rules from a security group

runInstances.description: Grants permission to launch one or more instances

runScheduledInstances.description: Grants permission to launch one or more Scheduled Instances

searchLocalGatewayRoutes.description: Grants permission to search for routes in a local gateway route table

searchTransitGatewayMulticastGroups.description: Grants permission to search for groups, sources, and members in a transit gateway multicast domain

searchTransitGatewayRoutes.description: Grants permission to search for routes in a transit gateway route table

sendDiagnosticInterrupt.description: Grants permission to send a diagnostic interrupt to an Amazon EC2 instance

sendSpotInstanceInterruptions.description: Grants permission to interrupt a Spot Instance

startInstances.description: Grants permission to start a stopped instance

startNetworkInsightsAccessScopeAnalysis.description: Grants permission to start a Network Access Scope analysis

startNetworkInsightsAnalysis.description: Grants permission to start analyzing a specified path

startVpcEndpointServicePrivateDnsVerific.description: Grants permission to start the private DNS verification process for a VPC endpoint service

stopInstances.description: Grants permission to stop an Amazon EBS-backed instance

terminateClientVpnConnections.description: Grants permission to terminate active Client VPN endpoint connections

terminateInstances.description: Grants permission to shut down one or more instances

unassignIpv6Addresses.description: Grants permission to unassign one or more IPv6 addresses from a network interface

unassignPrivateIpAddresses.description: Grants permission to unassign one or more secondary private IP addresses from a network interface

unmonitorInstances.description: Grants permission to disable detailed monitoring for a running instance

updateSecurityGroupRuleDescriptionsEgres.description: Grants permission to update descriptions for one or more outbound rules in a VPC security group

updateSecurityGroupRuleDescriptionsIngre.description: Grants permission to update descriptions for one or more inbound rules in a security group

withdrawByoipCidr.description: Grants permission to stop advertising an address range that was provisioned for use in AWS through bring your own IP addresses (BYOIP)
